seo.title: The Best Platform to Find and Manage Hourly Workers | Nowsta
seo.metaDesc: Source, hire, manage, and analyze multiple sources of the flex workforce in one platform— from W-2s and 1099s to gig or hourly workers.
seo.opengraphDescription: Source, hire, manage, and analyze multiple sources of the flex workforce in one platform— from W-2s and 1099s to gig or hourly workers.

nodes.rawHtml:
Meet Nowsta The OS for hourly
& shift workforces

nodes.rawHtml: The most powerful platform to find, manage, and pay your hourly team.

core/heading
nodes.rawHtml: Simplifying – and humanizing – the labor experience

nodes.name: core/paragraph
nodes.rawHtml: Nowsta is redefining the labor management process. No matter the staff – from W-2s and 1099s to temporary, flex, and gig workers – easily manage and maintain all workers under one platform. With Nowsta, quickly submit staffing agency work orders, source on-demand talent, and oversee operations across scheduling, time and attendance, payroll, and invoicing.

nodes.name: core/image
core/heading
nodes.rawHtml: Industries’ single source of staffing truth

nodes.name: core/paragraph
nodes.rawHtml: Seamlessly manage any shift, event, or operation across your entire workforce. No matter where the employee was sourced, Nowsta provides complete visibility into every job, ushering in a new level of transparency.

nodes.name: core/image
core/heading
nodes.rawHtml: Address staffing gaps with a flexible labor pool

nodes.name: core/paragraph
nodes.rawHtml: Tap into Nowsta’s marketplace, its vast network of staffing agencies, or your own flexpool to schedule headcount in advance, quickly fill staffing gaps, or source new, just-in-time labor that is experienced, vetted, and ready to work.

nodes.name: core/button
nodes.rawHtml: Learn more about on-demand staffing

nodes.name: core/image
core/heading
nodes.rawHtml: “We’re short-staffed” is a thing of the past

nodes.name: core/paragraph
nodes.rawHtml: Harness the power of automated insights and glean staffing shortages with the click of a button. Gain real-time visibility on your scheduled hourly workers and let Nowsta proactively manage callouts and no-shows to optimize your fill rates.

nodes.name: core/image
core/heading
nodes.rawHtml: Centralized reporting and tracking

nodes.name: core/paragraph
nodes.rawHtml: Keep staffing agencies and hourly workers accountable by seamlessly fulfilling orders, automating schedules, generating reports, and tracking attendance & performance in a platform designed for your business.

nodes.name: core/heading
nodes.rawHtml: Goodbye, low fill rates. Hello, cost savings.
